name: Common Content Project
bossPosition: Member and Secretary to the Steering Group
goal: The Common Content Project is a collaboration between premier accountancy bodies with an aim to further develop, maintain and unify high quality professional accountancy education benchmarks reflected in the distinct qualifications of participating bodies and recognised internationally as meeting the challenges posed by globalisation and the needs of diverse stakeholders
euInitiatives: Statutory Audit Directive, Professional Qualifications Directive, and various Educational Directives
